title: Need legal help please
body: So ill cut it short, i have put money into this game in the promise of goods to be received, but recently i got suspended(it comes off suspension but i lose skins and rewards) all because i got to gold this season instead of silver again which isnt against the rules in anyway, now taking what i have paid for and worked for seems like it would be illegal in some way, does anyone know anywhere to talk to that can help with legal stuff like that, i dont want to just go to media and slander them about being thieves, help would be nice :)

replies.body:
You may want to read this thread as it is pretty much the same question.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/fxGBEj5I-is-banning-someone-from-a-game-where-they-have-purchased-something-unlawful?show=flat&page=2

In summary you purchase Riot points which have no monetary value and use that to gain licensed access to in-game assets. All in-game assets accumulated by an account are still owned by Riot. Riot maintains the right to create, offer, remove, and/or modify in-game assets held in any account. 

Side note: Riot is considered a service provider as there are no goods being offered.

Hey there,

If you believe your rights as per the Australian Consumer Law have been violated, please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for further discussion.
